discord.rolemanager.blacklist.add.succes.message: Group $1 has been added to the blacklist!

discord.rolemanager.blacklist.add.usage.message: Usage: !rolemanager blacklist add [permission or rank] - Blacklist a ranks or permissions from being set.

discord.rolemanager.blacklist.remove.suc.message: Group $1 has been removed from the blacklist.

discord.rolemanager.blacklist.usage.message: Usage: !rolemanager blacklist [add / remove] [permission or rank] - Blacklist a ranks or permissions from being set.

discord.rolemanager.permission.sync.off.message: Bot permissions will no longer be synced.

discord.rolemanager.permission.sync.on.message: Bot permissions will now be synced with users who have their account linked with the bot.

discord.rolemanager.ranks.sync.off.message: Ranks will no longer be synced.

discord.rolemanager.ranks.sync.on.message: Ranks will now be synced with users who have their account linked with the bot.
